page.title: 05FREE-TIME IN PENNARD.
page.content: TO FIND OUT SOME INFORMATION WE SENT OUT A LARGE NUMBER OF QUESTIONAIRRES TO PEOPLE LIVING IN PENNARD . OBVIOUSLY PEOPLE LOOK FORWARD TO THEIR FREE TIME, AND ENJOY A WIDE VARIETY OF ENTERTAINMENTS, INCLUDING SPORTS, CINEMA, CONCERTS, THEATRE, TELEVISION AND RADIO. MANY PEOPLE WATCH SPORTS, AND GO TO CINEMAS AND THE THEATRE IN THE NEARBY CITY OF SWANSEA . ONE OF THE MAIN ATTRACTIONS IS THE BRANGWYN HALL , WHERE CONCERTS ARE HELD. THE LOCAL RADIO STATION, SWANSEA SOUND, IS LIKED BY ALMOST EVERYONE.IT BROADCASTS PROGRAMMES OF LOCAL INTEREST, NEWS REPORTS AND POPULAR MUSIC. THE MOST POPULAR RADIO STATION, THOUGH, IS THE NATIONAL STATION_RADIO ONE .
